= Installation = 
== Maven users ==
Add the following dependency to your pom.xml:
{{{
<dependency>
      <groupId>com.jayway.awaitility</groupId>
      <artifactId>awaitility</artifactId>
      <version>1.1</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

== Non-maven users ==
Download [http://awaitility.googlecode.com/files/awaitility-1.1.zip Awaitility 1.1] and put it in your class-path. You may also need to download the [http://awaitility.googlecode.com/files/awaitility-dependencies.zip third-party dependencies] and put them in your classpath as well. 

= Documentation =
When you've successfully downloaded and configured Awaitility in your classpath please refer to the [Usage user guide] for examples.
